C ******** MEDAPP Source ***********************************************
sdef erg=fpar=d5
     par=d4
     pos= 50 6.5 0
     x=50
     y=d1
     z=d2
     vec=-1 0 0
     dir=1
si1 4.25 7
sp1    0.   1.
si2 -1.0 1.0
sp2    0.   1.
SI4 L 1 $Discrete lines of particles 1 (1 = neutrons and 2 = photons)
SP4   3.25 $Distribution probabilities
DS5 S 6 $Energy bins for neutrons
si6 h   1.00e-10            $// Energy-Bins Neutron
